body_html: Is support for the adaptive variance parameter version of DC-ASGD planned on being added? The paper found that it performed better in all cases than the constant version which is currently implemented.
body_text: Is support for the adaptive variance parameter version of DC-ASGD planned on being added? The paper found that it performed better in all cases than the constant version which is currently implemented.
body: Is support for the adaptive variance parameter version of DC-ASGD planned on being added? The paper found that it performed better in all cases than the constant version which is currently implemented.
